sentences.en: A gust of breeze moved down the hillside, ruffling the grass.
sentences.cn: 一阵微风吹下山坡，使青草如波浪起伏。

sentences.en: Above on the hillside was a large, gaunt, grey house.
sentences.cn: 山坡上有幢难看的灰色大房子。

sentences.en: At early morning I went up through the hillside woods.
sentences.cn: 清晨我穿越山坡的小树林.

sentences.en: He pointed the telescope at a deer on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 他把望远镜对着山坡上的一只小鹿.

sentences.en: Olives look romantic on a hillside in Provence.
sentences.cn: 普罗旺斯一处山坡上的橄榄林呈现出一派浪漫风情。

sentences.en: She was on the hillside, part way up.
The airplane crashed on a hillside.
The children are on the hillside flying their kites.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在山坡上放风筝.

sentences.en: The children could be seen hacking across the hillside on their ponies.
sentences.cn: 可以看到孩子们正骑着小马穿过山坡。

sentences.en: The hotel was perched precariously on a steep hillside.
sentences.cn: 旅馆危险地坐落在陡峭的山坡上.

sentences.en: The missile buried itself deep in the grassy hillside.
sentences.cn: 导弹深深地埋在杂草丛生的山坡上。

sentences.en: The primroses should begin to seed themselves down the steep hillside.
sentences.cn: 报春花应该开始沿着陡峭的山坡一路撒播种子了。

sentences.en: There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛.

sentences.en: They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.cn: 他们正从山坡上采大理石。

sentences.en: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在长满草的山坡上吃午饭.

sentences.en: To the east of our school, there's a naked hillside.
sentences.cn: 我们学校东边有片光秃秃的山坡.

sentences.en: We clambered up the hillside to the ridge above.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着山坡费力地爬上了山脊.

trans.tran_en: the sloping side of a hill
